name: Apricot and Fern
description:
In Apricot and Fern, have a relaxing evening exploring this cute cafe nestled deep in the woods. Talk to the patrons, who love to spend their time lounging, playing games, and chit-chatting the night away.

Note: In the interest of performance, the Mac build has pretty heavily downgraded graphics, while still performing pretty slowly, so the Windows version is highly recommended, if possible. The Mac version is still fully functional, though.

Install Instructions:

Windows:

  1. Download the "Apricot and Fern Windows.zip" file
  2. Locate the file wherever you downloaded it
  3. Right-click the file and select "Extract All", then choose where to extract the files to
  4. Run "Apricot and Fern.exe"

Mac:

  1. Download the "Apricot and Fern Mac.zip" file
  2. Find where you downloaded the file and double-click it to extract it
  3. Run the application
  4. If a pop-up tells you that it cannot run the program because it is from an unknown developer, open your Settings
  5. Go to Security and Privacy
  6. Click the "Open Anyway" button at the bottom of the window

Note: Because I ran out of time and couldn't add a pause menu, use Alt+F4 or CMD+Q to force quit the program
